biotools.summary: A tool for predicting coarse grain RNA tertiary structures. Create models of the tertiary structure of RNA molecules starting from the secondary structure. The resulting models contain the positions of the helices and loops in 3D.

bioschemas.name: Ernwin
bioschemas.summary: A tool for predicting coarse grain RNA tertiary structures. Create models of the tertiary structure of RNA molecules starting from the secondary structure. The resulting models contain the positions of the helices and loops in 3D.
